nodes.text: An infant Human girl born into House Organa, one of the Great Houses of the planet Alderaan, was switched with an infant from House Thul as part of a Thul plot to attain power. The Thul infant was raised as an Organa, and House Thul supported the girl as a potential bride for the crown prince before a young Jedi exposed the deception.
The Organa infant was first mentioned in the Codex entry for House Thul in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic; however, the entry does not specify the girl's fate.
